document_data.caption: A map showing Lath in central Halruaa.
document_data.name: Lath
document_data.mainbody: '''Lath''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Halruaa]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2aNEIc}}
document_data.Geography: Lath was located in central Halruaa. The town lay just north of the banks of the [[River Halar]] and [[Lake Halruaa]]. It was a short distance from the capital of [[Halarahh]].
